shortDescription: A Buffer overflow vulnerability in DreamSecurity MagicLine4NX versions 1.0.0.1 to 1.0.0.26 allows an attacker to remotely execute code.
vulnerabilityName: dreamsecurity magicline_4.0 Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
